participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and easy-going, enjoys the outdoors and is passionate about animals.
participant_1.background: i have three arabian horses. i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to ride horses. i like to listen to rock music while working.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Creative and expressive, loves to explore different cultures and has a strong interest in literature.
participant_2.background: i played football for a division a college. i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i enjoy poetry.
